section.title: The connection element information item
section.para: Connection element information items (referred to in this specification as connection elements) are element information items in the CellML 1.1 or CellML 1.2 namespaces with local name equal to connection. CellML Processing software MUST support both forms, but SHOULD generate connection elements in the CellML 1.1 namespace.

section.title: Specific information items when in CellML 1.2 namespace

listitem.para: Every connection element MUST contain a component_1 attribute in the empty namespace. The value of the component_1 attribute MUST be a valid CellML Identifier. The value of this attribute MUST be equal to the name attribute on a component or import component element in the CellML Infoset.

Every connection element MUST contain a component_2 attribute in the empty namespace. The value of the component_2 attribute MUST be a valid CellML Identifier. The value of this attribute MUST be equal to the name attribute on a component or import component element in the CellML Infoset.
Every connection element MUST contain one or more map_variables element ().

section.title: Specific information items when in CellML 1.1 namespace

listitem.para:
Every connection element MUST contain exactly one element with local name map_variables in the CellML 1.1 namespace, and that element shall in turn have two attributes:
The component_1 attribute in the empty namespace. The value of the component_1 attribute MUST be a valid CellML Identifier. The value of this attribute MUST be equal to the name attribute on a component or import component element in the CellML Infoset. Component_1 attributes SHALL be treated in the same way as if they appeared on the connection element in the CellML 1.2 namespace.
The component_2 attribute in the empty namespace. The value of the component_2 attribute MUST be a valid CellML Identifier. The value of this attribute MUST be equal to the name attribute on a component or import component element in the CellML Infoset. Component_2 attributes SHALL be treated in the same way as if they appeared on the connection element in the CellML 1.2 namespace.
Every connection element MUST contain one or more map_variables elements ().
